text: niṅṅaḷeānnicc allāhuvinṟe kayaṟil muṟukepiṭikkuka. niṅṅaḷ bhinnicc pēākarut‌. niṅṅaḷ an'yēān'yaṁ śatrukkaḷāyirunnappēāḷ niṅṅaḷkk allāhu ceyta anugrahaṁ ōrkkukayuṁ ceyyuka. avan niṅṅaḷuṭe manas'sukaḷ tam'mil kūṭṭiyiṇakki. aṅṅane avanṟe anugrahattāl niṅṅaḷ sahēādaraṅṅaḷāyittīrnnu. niṅṅaḷ agnikuṇḍattinṟe vakkilāyirunnu. enniṭṭatil ninn niṅṅaḷe avan rakṣappeṭutti. aprakāraṁ allāhu avanṟe dr̥ṣṭāntaṅṅaḷ niṅṅaḷkk vivariccutarunnu; niṅṅaḷ nērmārgaṁ prāpikkuvān vēṇṭi
